item.title: Use WordPress to build a static website and host it on AWS for (practically) free.
item.description: AWS and WordPress can go together well Introduction Many people are using WordPress today to host websites that are primarily static. These are websites such as blogs that basically contain static content. Such a website just needs to be updated when, e.g., a new article is written.
